STM: Struggling with the pace of Intro to Comp Sci, considering dropping out.
Feeling overwhelmed by coding assignments and questioning the choice of major.
MTM: Transitioning from high school to college, learning the basics of programming and blockchain technology.
Adjusting to academic expectations and workload in a tech-focused curriculum.
LTM: Interest in technology and blockchain started in high school, leading to a choice of major in Computer Science.
High expectations for tech career but currently facing initial challenges.

short_term.goal: Seek tutoring or study groups for Comp Sci to improve understanding
Attend a blockchain and Web3 seminar at NYU

long_term: Gain proficiency in coding, blockchain, and related technologies to prepare for a career in tech.
Secure an internship or part-time role in a tech company to gain real-world experience.

plot_points.description: Xavier considers changing his major or dropping out due to academic struggles.

STM: Feeling disconnected from high school friends due to new college life.
Unsure about social interactions, considering skipping social events.
MTM: Building new friendships in college, navigating social dynamics.
Feeling the contrast between expectations of college life and the reality of workload and social pressures.
LTM: Exploration of personal identity through social interactions and independence from family.
Initial excitement for college life now tempered by the reality of adjustment.

short_term.goal: Join a student club or interest group to meet like-minded individuals
Initiate regular hangouts with new college friends

long_term: Develop a strong social network in college and beyond.
Explore romantic relationships and deepen personal connections.

plot_points.description: Xavier's struggle with feeling out of place leads to introspection and reevaluation of social expectations.

STM: Struggling with sleep due to late-night coding sessions and social activities.
Feeling the strain of academic pressure on mental well-being.
MTM: Adapting to college lifestyle, balancing study, social life, and health.
Noticing the impact of stress and lack of sleep on overall health.
LTM: Transition from high school's structured environment to college's freedom and responsibility.
Developing habits to manage stress and maintain physical health.

short_term.goal: Establish a regular sleep schedule to combat sleep deprivation
Incorporate stress-relief activities like meditation or yoga

long_term: Achieve a sustainable balance between work, play, and personal health.
Prioritize mental health and resilience to cope with life's challenges.

plot_points.description: Xavier's struggle with sleep and stress leads to a pivotal moment where he decides to prioritize his well-being.

STM: Complaints about the high cost of living in NYC, especially food prices.
MTM: Learning to manage expenses with a limited budget.
First experiences with financial independence and budgeting.
LTM: Initial financial education from parents, now applying those principles in real-life scenarios.

short_term.goal: Set up a monthly budget and track expenses
Explore student discounts and economical food options

long_term: Build a financial foundation through savings, investments, and understanding of cryptocurrencies.

STM: Questioning the purpose and value of education, feeling out of place.
Reflecting on the authenticity of social interactions and personal happiness.
MTM: Adjusting to new philosophical perspectives brought by college environment and independence.
Struggling with identity and societal expectations.
LTM: Initial curiosity about technology's impact on society, now deepened by personal experiences.
Exploring existential questions about purpose and success.

short_term.goal: Engage in philosophical discussions or join a philosophy club
Read books on existentialism and technology's impact

long_term: Develop a coherent philosophy of life that integrates technology and personal growth.
Contribute to discussions on technology's role in shaping society.

plot_points.description: Xavier's existential crisis at 2am leads to a philosophical exploration of purpose and success.
